input.sentences: my brother had his wedding last week .
he looked so happy with his new wife !
we had so many people attend the reception .
we all talked and ate and celebrated the wedding .
i was so happy for my brother and wish him and his wife the best !
output.sentences: The Bride and Groom walked into the chapel.
After they exchanged vows they embraced.
The bride and the groom's family welcomed them at the reception hall.
They sat down to enjoy drinks and food.
They bride and groom had their first dance to begin the party.
